String: Client: Glenne (Pikeman's Way, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Take ointment to the sentry Aaveleon. Find him in the woods of West Ronfaure.
Client: Miageau (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Draw water from the Cheval River in East Ronfaure.
Client: Rosel (Rosel's Armour Shop, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Deliver the receipt for the prince's cloak to the chateau guards.
Client: Altiret (Airship Docks, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Retrieve the gilt glasses stolen by the pickpocket.
Client: Ailbeche (Parade Grounds, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: A child stands crying in the Parade Grounds. Find his father for him.
Client: Hanaa Punaa (Tanners' Guild, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Collect three giant sheepskins for Hanaa, and she'll make some fine clothes for you.
Client: Gulemont (Rusty Anchor Pub, Port San d'Oria)Summary: A patron lost a document somewhere in West Ronfaure. Find it for him.
Client: Abeaule (Phoenix Perch Inn, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Purchase some batagreens from Phairet. Find him in the tower on the southern fringes of West Ronfaure.
Client: Raimbroy (Grocery, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Collect five pots of honey for the grocer.
Client: Abioleget (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Deliver blue peas to a friar on retreat. Find him in a tower in the southeast area of East Ronfaure.
Client: Balasiel (Watchdog Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Obtain a revival tree root from King Ranperre's Tomb.
Client: Andecia (House on Squire Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Replace the water for King Ranperre's gravestone with a fresh offering.
Client: Fontoumant (Cargo Room B, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Deliver parcels to their proper recipients.
Client: Hanaa Punaa (Tanners' Guild, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Collect three lizard skins for Hanaa, and she will make you something in return.
Client: Regine (Regine's Magicmart, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Hand out fifteen flyers for the struggling magic shop. Pass them only to townsfolk, not adventurers.
Client: Olbergieut (Cathedral Manuscript Room, N. San d'Oria)Summary: Bring the "Scripture of Wind" to a friar on retreat. Find him at the Crag of Holla on the La Theine Plateau.
Client: Balasiel (Watchdog Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Journey to the waterfall in Ordelle's Caves, and bring back proof of your visit.
Client: Amaura (Watchdog Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Bring Amaura some thyme moss, and she'll concoct a brew with curative powers.
Client: Taumila (Sundries Shop, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Collect three black tiger fangs.
Client: Pagisalis (Cathedral Reliquary, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Collect two lumps of beeswax for making candles.
Client: Helbort (Helbort's Blades, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Find the traveling merchant Alexius in Jugner Forest and place an order for weapons.
Client: Balasiel (Watchdog Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Solve the riddle of the task book.
Client: Abeaule (Inn, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: A guest at the inn has fallen ill. Call on Amaura in Southern San d'Oria to get some cold medicine.
Client: Hanaa Punaa (Tanners' Guild, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Collect three black tiger hides for Hanaa, and she will make you something in return.
Client: Kuu Mohzolhi (Phoenix Perch Inn, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Give the tiny Mithra some flowers so she can plant them in Queen Leaute's garden. Perhaps something white?
Client: Curilla (Temple Knights' Quarters, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: Fetch some water from the hot spring on the peak of Horlais.
Client: Novalmauge (Bostaunieux Oubliette)Summary: The jailor wants you to bring him the blood of a beastman. Some people say he is a vampire.
Client: Chalvatot (Queen Leaute's Garden, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: Bring some Derfland humus to use as fertilizer so that flowers might grow in the late queen's garden.
Client: Vilatroire (Watchtower, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: In order to form a cohesive party, gather at least one more adventurer of the same allegiance.
Client: Vilatroire (Watchtower, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: In order to form a cohesive party, gather at least one more adventurer of the same race.
Client: Vilatroire (Watchtower, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: In order to form a cohesive party, gather at least one more adventurer of the same job.
Client: Maugie (Eastgate, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: The four signposts in Jugner Forest need scrubbing. Clean them before someone gets lost.
Client: Portaure (Cargo Room B, Port San d'Oria)Summary: The Brugaire Consortium wants  you to smuggle a package onto the airship and take it to the Tenshodo in Jeuno. Nighttime is the safest option.
Client: Belgidiveau (Sluice Gates, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: It seems poison was thrown into the water near the sluice gates. Find an antidote before someone falls ill.
Client: Parvipon (Tanners' Guild, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Fetch three rabbit hides.

Client: Morunaude (Furniture Store, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: The small teacup found in a cupboard sold at this store appears to have royal origins. The owner would doubtlessly be grateful to have it back.
Client: Dauperiat (Victory Arch, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Delivering a strange envelope to Monarlais Halver gets you sent on a mission to retrieve castle floor plans from Orcs in Ghelsba.

Client: Vamorcote (Laborman's Way,  Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Retrieve the key to a document box holding a copy of the castle floor plans. The key was buried long ago on a small island to the south of Batallia Downs.
Client: Femitte (Victory Square, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: A goldsmith is needed to fill an order. Only Elvaan need apply.
Client: Gallijaux (Wharf, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Gather carp by any means possible so Gallijaux can win a fishing contest against his little brother, Joulet.
Client: Joulet (Wharf, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Gather carp by any means possible so Joulet can win a fishing contest against his elder brother, Gallijaux.
Client: Legata (Lion Springs Tavern, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Fetch four stones of flint.
Client: Secodiand (Laborman's Way, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Fetch two bat wings.
Client: Maloquedil (Parade Grounds, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Fetch two cloves of Orc garlic to keep vampires away.
Client: Paouala (House on Squire Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Paouala cannot sleep, so bring her some Mary's Milk to cure her insomnia.
Client: Nogelle (Rusty Anchor Pub, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Fetch three chunks of salt from  Lufet's Lake. Beans at the Rusty Anchor are famous for their special salty taste.
Client: Eperdur (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Spirits of the dead in the Gusgen Mines blow an evil wind upon the land. Take a seal of banishing to a shack in the deepest tunnel within.
Client: Eperdur (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: An ancient tome of magic is lost. Journey to Fei'Yin and find another to replace it.
Client: Sharzalion (Lion Springs Tavern, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Retrieve some Orcish dried food from a storage hole in Davoi. Sharzalion will let you in on something in return.
Client: Curilla (Temple Knights' Quarters, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: Investigate reports of a ghost in the cathedral.
Client: Curilla (Temple Knights' Quarters, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: The spirit of Curilla's father Rainemard seems to be trying to say something.
Client: Narcheral (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: On the westernmost dune of Valkurm, a dark stalker lurks. Defeat it and bring back its Tavnazia pass.

Client: Narcheral (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: White mages of renown will be given a blessed item for the war against the undead. But first, they must bring Yagudo holy water to prove their worth.
Client: Narcheral (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Once you've found a Tavnazia bell in the Eldieme Necropolis, journey to Fei'Yin and commence the battle against the undead.
Client: Ailbeche (Parade Grounds, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: The boy needs a whetstone to sharpen an old blade. Find one for him in Ordelle's Caves.
Client: Ailbeche (Parade Grounds, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: All fishermen dream of hooking the big one. Catch him and obtain the treasure in his belly.
Client: Trion (Prince Royal's Room, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: Knights whisper of a traitor in their midst. An outsider is needed to investigate.
Client: Oiheaurese (Cathedral, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Excavate the wyvern egg that lies beneath the Maze of Shakhrami. Protect it from dragonslayers.
Client: Miaux (Near the Blacksmiths' Guild, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: To have her father's breastplate repaired by Ranchuriome, Miaux needs you to find an Altepa polishing stone.
Client: Ceraulian (Cargo Room A, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Ceraulian of the Brugaire Consortium needs your help to meet his quota.
Client: Rahal (Royal Knights' Quarters, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: Rahal wants you to gather information regarding the attacks on the Royal Knights.

Client: Norejaie (Lion Springs Tavern, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Norejaie wants you to exterminate an ecological threat, in Ordelle's Caves, according to Rojaireaut's instructions, and bring her evidence of the feat.
Client: Balasiel (Watchdog Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Balasiel requires your assistance in constructing a new set of polearm training guidelines for the San d'Orian knights.
Client: Novalmauge (Bostaunieux Oubliette)Summary: Lift the curse on the scythe that Novalmauge has given you and gain a new weapon technique.
Client: Thierride (Rusty Anchor Pub, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Fetch five slices of hare meat.
Clients: Aurege and Guilberdrier (Carpenters' Guild, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Varchet of the Carpenters' Guild has run off again. Find the slacker and get him back to work.
Client: Curilla (Temple Knights' Quarters, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: Curilla has agreed to help you polish your single-handed sword skills for the upcoming tourneys.
Client: Rondipur (Near the Blacksmiths' Guild, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: You are to escort Cannau to her desired destination within the Eldieme Necropolis.
Client: Eddy (Airship Dock, Port San d'Oria)Summary: You have been asked to return a dropped item to its rightful owner. The passenger should be on the next airship flight.
Client: Elmemague (Watchdog Alley, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: A criminal suspect has been spotted on La Theine Plateau. You have been asked to assist in his capture.
Client: Halver (Main Hall, Chateau d'Oraguille)Summary: You are to find a suitable bride for Prince Trion based on the requirements explained to you.
Over the Hills and Far Away

Client: Antreneau (Rusty Anchor Pub, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Antreneau's Uncle Louverance set out on a journey to cross the Uleguerand Range quite some time ago. Antreneau tells you that the other side of the mountains can be reached through a cave found on the slopes of Thousandfall Ridge...

Client: Sobane (House on Pikeman's Way, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Sobane has heard some disturbing news from her husband, the head royal chef. She wishes to make a request concerning that tale, but first requires you to bring a "cathedral tapestry" to prove your integrity.

Client: Sobane (House on Pikeman's Way, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: According to Sobane's husband Ondieumais, the count who owns the Carpenters' Landing territory is being threatened. Find a way to communicate with the Tonberries of Carpenters' Landing and discover who is making these threats.
Client: Rouva (Victory Square, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Rouva needs a sprig of the rare Rivernewort to spruce up her succulent suppers.
Client: Amutiyaal (Lion Square, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: The mercenary company "Salaheem's Sentinels" has asked you to help recruit new members.
Southern San d'Oria, in front of the fountain)Summary:Help distressed Atelloune straighten out a young Elvaan brat by bringing her some ladybug wings that will blow his mind.
Client: Vounebariont (Auction House, Port San d'Oria)Summary: Collect five beetle shells suitable for making medicine.
Client: Ramua (Carpenters' Guild, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: The overworked Ramua asks for your aid in collecting timber samples for a guild survey that she's been too busy to conduct herself.

Client: Gondebaud (Lion Square, Southern San d'Oria)Summary: Gondebaud of the Jeuno Institute of Magical Studies has introduced you to the Trust initiative and asked you to visit Excenmille in Northern San d'Oria.

Client: Castilchat (Watchtower, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: The Rhinostery has developed a new "mini" tuning fork of ice. Ringing it upon the protocrystal in Fei'Yin will open the path to a one-on-one battle with the beast that awaits inside. However, only summoners are allowed to take up this challenge.
Client: Gulmama (Watchtower, Northern San d'Oria)Summary: Ring the tuning fork of ice upon the protocrystal in Fei'Yin. A path will open to the trial that awaits.
